Shareholder Name: Abdul Mohsen Mohammed Abdul Rahman Alsaleh
Mohamed Saleh Abdul Rahman Al Athel

Description: Malath Cooperative Insurance (known as: Malath Insurance) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2007. Malath Insurance operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Property and Casualty Insurance. It has companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Reinsurance and Property and Casualty Insurance. Malath Insurance is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in April 2007.
